XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for ap_reports local plugin

TABLE.NAME: apreport_enrol
TABLE.COMMENT: holds daily activty metrics for retention management

FIELD.NAME: enrollmentid
FIELD.COMMENT: a constructed, ap-specific enrollment id: The unique identifier assigned to the student enrollment in the course

FIELD.NAME: studentid
FIELD.COMMENT: The university student ID from the SIS

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: reference to moodle courseid; when joined for output, this should yeild: A unique identifier for the course; it must match course ID from SIS

FIELD.NAME: sectionid
FIELD.COMMENT: reference to [ues] section number; when joined, it should yeild: A unique identifier for the section; it must match the section ID from the SIS

FIELD.NAME: itemtype
FIELD.COMMENT: string representing the module type; possible values include “Assignment”, “Assessment”, “Quiz”, “Posting”, or “Other”

FIELD.NAME: itemid
FIELD.COMMENT: id number for the item; this should be unique within its type-context; AP-spec: A unique identifier for the coursework item

FIELD.NAME: itemname
FIELD.COMMENT: AP-spec: The name or description of the coursework item

FIELD.NAME: datesubmitted
FIELD.COMMENT: unix time stamp; Date assignment or quiz turned in, posting completed, or assessment done

FIELD.NAME: pointspossible
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of possible points for assignment, posting, assessment, or quiz (blank if not graded)

FIELD.NAME: pointsreceived
FIELD.COMMENT: AP-spec: Number of points received for assignment, posting, assessment, or quiz

FIELD.NAME: categoryweight
FIELD.COMMENT: AP-spec: Weight to be applied to this item when determining grade for course

FIELD.NAME: created
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of the time this record was created; this is used by the application to determine the freshness of the data and candidacy for [daily] deletion/refreshment
